scripts.dev: dotnet tool restore && dotnet fable watch src -o ./src/bin/fable-js -e .js --sourceMaps --configuration Debug --run vite --mode development
scripts.start: dotnet tool restore && dotnet fable watch src -o ./src/bin/fable-js --run vite serve
scripts.build: dotnet tool restore && dotnet fable src -o ./src/bin/fable-js --run vite build
